lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello and good evening, everyone, and welcome to Critical Role, where a bunch of us crazy, zany, nerdy-ass voice actors play Dungeons and Dragons. For those of us meeting us for the first time, welcome; this is us playing DND from a homebrew campaign with a few homebrew rules, but overall, it's a fun time. Couple of announcements I want to get over before we start up the game: One, we have a subscriber challenge, apparently, every 100 subscribers we get, we are giving away a signed poster of the cast of Critical Role, as well as a signed portrait or a giant poster of a beautiful piece of art by Kit Buss, our official artist. The cast will be signing both of those and giving those away to whoever wins and every 100 subscribers whoever is active in the chatroom will be opting in to be chosen randomly for that prize, so we'll keep an eye out for that and we will be announcing those winners as they come in. So that's every 100 subscribers. Also, there is a challenge that if we can manage to hit 7,000 subscribers by the beginning of the day tomorrow, the streaming tomorrow, one, there will be apparently some sort of Pikachu costume will be purchased and worn around the studio. This is all the information I have, and I'm excited at the vagueness that was presented to me, because that could mean anything, which, you know, with enough pressure, peer pressure especially, anyone can be put into a Pikachu costume.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Not anyone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Anyone. Also, there is apparently a promise for a party tomorrow evening with some fun guests and performers if we manage to hit 7k by the beginning of tomorrow's stream. This has been given to me by our gracious Overlord. Also, apparently the mods have their own challenge if we hit 7k by tomorrow that I've been told I don't really need to mention, which means I'm going to mention it, because apparently, there will be a Snugglelord or Overlord body pillow made. I think you should try and make that happen.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I asked really politely for that not to be mentioned. Cool, no, I'm going to remember that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How could you not mention that?! How could you not mention that? So 7k, guys. See if we can, see if we could make that happen, because I think it means if one can be made, many can be made and I think all of us here at Critical Role would be happy to have copies for ourselves. So that's now up in the air. Let's see. A couple other quick announcements: we also have our charity, 826LA, they're a fantastic charity, 826 across the nation, but especially we're donating to 826LA. They have afterschool programs and a lot of tutoring for creative writing skills and general literacy skills-- I can't talk today-- for kids from five up to late teens. They're a great charity; check them out. We really appreciate you guys' support in that. Also, we will have a one week break in Critical Role next week as both me and Marisha will be out of town doing that thing in the desert, so we'll be gone for a week, but we will return the week after, so that will be the second week of September to pick up our regular Critical Role schedule from there. I think that's it, and that's all. Let's see if anybody else have any major announcements.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Love you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, guys. Welcome back. Picking up where we left off to give you guys some overview here, the party had put themselves in a situation where they-- Taliesin is currently cleansing the area of Wil Wheaton's dice rolls from the previous two weeks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Feel better?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll see if I feel better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it does. The energy feels better.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, feeling better.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If there's one place to use the flamethrower, I think it's on that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's right there. Salt the earth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, like you're not so much right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was being facetious; I didn't see it. I'm so comforted that it's on your wrist right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not everybody.

lines.name: MATT, LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll get to that. We will be coming back to the game in just a moment. Real fast, Travis, you should show us the really cool little thing that you--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For my birthday, I got this. This is really great and heavy.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: If it was sharp, it would be a functional weapon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is a functional weapon without sharpening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So between that and Orion's wrist-mounted fireball launcher, we are covering all the bases.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have Liam's daggers. Laura's gotten a bow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have; I can't wait to shoot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Matt got a cloak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I did get a cloak. We're slowly being converted by you guys into our respective roles.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Somewhere, there's a guy working in a morgue going, "Oh!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's coming to my house. It's going to my house, right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have been staying within the confines of the Slayer's Take guildhall and you can sense the energy itself is tense in the air. Mertin and the Huntmaster have done their best to keep you calm, brought you what you need, and assure you that this was not a very difficult task they sent them on, but even as the days wane on, you can sense that their overwhelming confidence seems to be slowly faltering as well. It's about midday on the fourth day when you hear a few loud thumps from out in the foyer area. You hear some low voices for a while, some conversations, some laughter, one particularly high, screechy voice you're not familiar with that then slowly disappears. Moments of quiet pass, and there is a knock at your guys' door on the far side of the guildhall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you guys want to get it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You open the door. Waiting there, you see Mertin standing there and his red, scruffy, scarred-up halfling self with a sly grin, as he looks over his shoulder. "It's good to see you! I "am pleasured to give you information that the rest of your allies have returned and you are requested "immediately in the foyer area of the Guildhall."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just run past him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You push him aside.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Really, they're alive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "From what I can tell, at least most of them. I wasn't counting to be honest, but I--" The rest of you push past, rushing down the main other hallway that opens up into the main foyer area. You can see the hanging iron chandeliers are shifting slightly from the impact of the door slam. As you immediately peer around the side, you can see before you Vex, Grog, Percy, and Scanlan, all there, with little Trinket in the back, looking a little chilled. They look a little worse for wear, but definitively alive, as they have just received their payment for their Slayer's Take trial contract.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I run up to Vex and I give her a big hug.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I run up to Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ow, ow!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hold out my arms for Vax.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (pained) No, it's very nice to see you too, ow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everybody else is getting a fucking hug.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm walking very cautiously. Hey, come here, big guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! And I just squeeze him in, rub him amongst my breasts.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You smell like, ugh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan stands there with his arms open. "If only she was here..."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've been drinking a lot of water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's all right, we made enough money to make the rest of my evening interesting."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come here, you. Tousle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He almost died! How did you do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think we almost-- (softly) Hi.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, for fuck's sake.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As they're hugging, I go to Grog and I-- how big are you? I have missed you too. I had no idea how much I would miss both of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so glad you guys are alive.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Where's Percy? Oh there he is!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: During this extremely awkward massaging, teat-milking process--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I was hugging!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now, if you could please follow me, I shall reveal to you one of our great secrets. One you must "keep." And with that intensity you see the general white color of her eyes flashes yellow for a second. "The time has come to brand you as new members. Please to be following me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please to be following you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did she say brand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She turns around. Mertin joins her side and the two begin walking towards the back side of the foyer, towards the hallway that was on the left side of the back area. You guys continue to follow them down a long hallway that is just door after door after door on both sides. Just closed, seems like almost a good ten or so doors on each side of this doorway as you progress. You do manage to come across one door that is open and it leads into a darkened training area where you see two Slayer's Take members are currently in the process of training with two training dummies in this dirt sandpit area. As you guys walk past, they stop and look over their shoulders and give you a nod as you continue past. You get to the very end of this darkened hallway, where you see before you a very intimidatingly large solid iron door. No hinges, just a large slab of iron with bolts into it. Flanking it are two very well armed and armored members of the guild. Burly humans with heavily tattooed skin. From what you can see, each one of them, their shoulder exposed, you can see the same marking into it. The Slayer's Take mark comes across as almost like a scarred brand in that type of shape and design.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: That's cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to have very skilled people branding us, I'm sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vanessa looks over her shoulder. (laughs) "I think you'll be hard-pressed to find someone more skilled."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does that mean they're not skilled?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, the two gentlemen standing either side of the door stand up and give a small bow to the Huntmaster.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we get to choose where we get branded?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, after hearing this loud metallic tensing sound as the two guys have now grabbed these wheels that are bolted into the sides of the door and are winching them down. And you can see as they are pulling, you can hear the sound of chains grinding and growing tense. And the iron door (metal and stone scraping), slowly raises up, revealing a darkened hallway that descends down stairs, about 15 feet wide.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Perception?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What could go wrong?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's use this one. Oh, that was great.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Has everybody realized, they want to burn things into us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've done worse things to each other.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, even less. It's a nine, total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine total. Good to know. That stairway looks pretty sturdy. That darkness looks pretty dark. Even with your darkvision.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I use my passive perception?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, keeping that in mind. As you look inside, you can see there are torches bolted to the wall that give a very low ember light, and they are spaced out about every 20 feet or so.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Not enough. Light!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, there we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you cast Light, it brightens up the room for a second, the two guards wince to the side and Vanessa spins around and says, "Fool, put that out this instant!"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He had a point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's not wrong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her intense demeanor softens for a moment and she goes, "There is a process to this. I "appreciate your patience."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We must be branded in the dark, Tiberius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She turns around and continues down the stairs. Do you guys follow below?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm last.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I put Percy in front of me.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I saunter in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What's the walking order in this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the order?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, what is the order? Who's anxious? You seem jazzed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm in front.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, fine, I'm behind him.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll be right after Vex.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll be after Tiberius.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm the caboose!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think the caboose makes sense now!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog doesn't know that! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go. And Percy, you're where?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, Grog says I'm right in front of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as you guys descend down these stairs. The first thing that catches you is the air itself has a very old smell to it. Almost like the interior of a dust-covered antique store or a long-forgotten and untouched tomb. It has that smell of ancient sediment to it. You continue down the stairs until eventually it opens into a large, darkened chamber. The ground itself has a soft, almost sandy bottom. Turn that shit off, whoever's phone that was!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That wasn't me! It might've been me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All good. (laughs) Check your phones. No worries.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It might've been me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These little torches placed amongst the entire thing brighten as you step forward and frame the visual of this strange, ancient structure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pardon me, Vanessa. I thought you were just a band of hunters?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (shushing) "Do you trust me?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not really, no.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to agree with the room. But you are nicer, which is different.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we're locked in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, either you follow or you leave and we leave you to the machinations of the seat of "judgment, and you can deal with the law of Vasselheim."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's do it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're here. We're with you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're on board.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The law of Vasselheim, for not getting branded?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Then follow me." And she steps toward the front of this ziggurat-type structure which has a staircase that is very wide at the bottom and slowly pinches as it reaches the top of the structure about 25 feet up. As you begin walking up the stairs, I believe you have the highest passive perception. You notice there are small symbols carved in various ways throughout the entirety of this structure's design. Very faintly along the trim of the bottom of some of the stonework, also largely placed on the top of these obelisks on different sides. It resembles an eye placed within a sickle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are you looking at?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's some weird stuff up high.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like spider webs?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, like eyeballs. Is it like eyeballs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a single eye that is placed within a sickle-like curvature that has a handle to it. Almost like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it moving?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's just a carving in the stonework that resembles an eye.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't see an eye.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's that carving right there. looks like an eye. Does anybody know anything about anything that looks like eyes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be more of a religion check for anybody who has--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Religion check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Religion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I try?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, you're welcome to make a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Start it off. The sage worked!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (splutters)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking at it, you immediately get the thought that this symbol represents Ioun, which is the goddess of knowledge, prophecy, and skill. Not one of the heavily worshipped-- you haven't seen really any bastion of worship of Ioun in the city yet. It's always been those main five. This is the first temple to Ioun you've seen since you've been here, and it's definitely been under here for quite some time. As you guys get to the very top of the structure, you can see before you, the top of the ziggurat-like platform is about 50 feet across on each side. In the center there is a small raised platform about five feet high, four feet high, almost like a table or altar of some kind that is circular in its shape, and partially embedded in this is a large, solid glass globe-like sphere that is probably a good three feet in diameter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like anything we've seen before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's perfectly clear and it just sits there at rest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this where the burning happens?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vanessa seems to have not paid attention to your phrase and just shouts up into the darkness and goes, "Osysa! Osysa, come! We have fresh blood for you!" At which point, a loud roar breaks through the darkness, shaking the interior of the chamber where dust and sand begins to settle from the ceiling, which had been waiting there for quite some time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Was this in the fine print?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Guys, I'm thinking this might be a cult?

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: That was a really high squeak.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm a little nervous!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (thud) Steps onto the top of the ziggurat. These giant, griffon-like wings (whoosh) flare out, and as the light cascades up, you can see now atop this lion body is a female-like human face wreathed with a mane of ashy-blonde hair. Jewelry wrapped around the neck and the shoulders. You see as it looks down, the eyes peering across all of you. No pupils, just a glowing straight sky-blue color.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you the one that's going to be doing the branding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) A feminine smile comes to its lips as it bends down and looks over the rest of you. "I have watched from afar, Hunters. I sensed your arrival "and the spark of darkness you carried. I saw your fate bend towards ours and cross. At this "intersection, I greet you, and welcome you, proven ones, to our family." And she bows and closes her eyes ever so slightly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We return the bow. I return the bow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I look at Grog, like what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a fucking lion with wings!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll do the Draconic sort of--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You saw Harry Potter, the hippogriff will jack you up! Bow back!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I nod.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She acknowledges everyone's existence. And you see now, Huntmaster Vanessa is also in a very, very deep bow, and stands, giving you all this look of, don't do anything stupid. "I have been "keeper of this temple for hundreds of years--"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You don't look a day over 20!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Smooth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a brief moment where she gives you this keen look, head to the side like a curious creature. "Interesting. Humor does not find its way to my chambers often enough these days."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's unfortunate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate your candor, dragonborn."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She likes jokes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (hissing)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It just happened?! Like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reach over and pull, and there's no heat on the arm, but there is that burning pain. You go and you look under, pulling your armor to the side best you can and look. And there, over your right shoulder you can see this same brand that you saw adorning the shoulder of Vanessa when she exposed it earlier, as well as the two guards at the gate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you hold it up again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is now raised upon your skin, seemingly already healed. Like a long-healed burn or brand mark. And the pain slowly subsides into a dull sensation, but it is not a fresh burn. There is not any peeled skin. It looks like it maybe happened a few months ago, and yet there it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not going to lie, it looks pretty cool.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: The design is nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd have liked some warning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Join a few more clubs, and we're going to be all sleeved up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now, I have been here building this place and this guild for some time, with the intent of "helping rid the landscape of dangerous prey and helping those who are also aligned with the good "of the realm to bring their more powerful enchantments and uses to light."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we insight check and see if she's telling the truth? 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24! It would've been good if I remembered to bring my dice out. There we are. It's been a rushed-- yeah. She appears to be forthright and honest. There is a force of personality to her that speaks beyond any sort of mortal you've encountered, and even the extraplanar entities you've discussed with, there seems to be a forthrightness in her speech. You don't feel there's any layer of deceit involved. She glances down at the glass sphere that's embedded in the altar, and as she looks down, what was once clear glass slowly begins to glow with the same white-blue light as her eyes. "It is here through this Heartglass that Ioun herself extends my "vision to watch the world. From here, I can see where our quarry lies and lays rest. When "contracts are brought to our attention, I can see if they can or cannot be hunted. I can see where "the worlds flow between. I can watch over my mate, wherever far he may be. This gift came at a price "to me, but the good I can do, that we can do, is far more important than my sacrifice."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far does your vision fall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Welcome to the Slayer's Take."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I take this with great honor. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wings expand, and with a great leap, the creature disappears into the darkness. If you want to make an arcana check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Has the glass totally faded?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The glass has faded, yes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll take that. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. You've heard of entities like this. This is a sphinx entity, specifically referred to as a gynosphinx.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dinosphinx?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gynosphinx.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Gynosphinx.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Highly erotic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm still trying to figure out his sexuality.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You didn't check for the bits?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A gynosphinx is a feminine sphinx entity that specializes in being able to peer past lies, to peer past magical veils. You can see how this altar, this sphere is an extension of that power, though even that has its limits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good thing we didn't try to lie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point Vanessa turns around to the rest of you. "Well, then. I think that went rather "well, yes?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I like the element of surprise."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So question. The little blue flashy thing that happens with the eyes. Is that going to happen with us now, too?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can she see through our eyes now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gives you a curious look. "I do not know."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan's behind you going--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I think she is. Very happy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scanlan is the Cinemax of this group.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan says, "Well, if she's been in here for 200 years unable to leave, she's going to be "really happy with what I can offer."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Peer into the scatological.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have been released, and I believe we have some "funds to give to you, as you are now officially part of the hydra contract you originally broke."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay! I like the way you talk, Vanessa.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have some questions, though. What is this relationship, you and us, now? Are we obligated?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are walking back out of the chamber towards the stairway, she goes, "There is "no requirement for you, you are but a member of the Slayer's Take. If you wish to come by, we have "contracts available, and you can look about those if you wish to take up. If you feel you are "capable of doing it, let us know. You will then be bound to that contract to complete it, but there "is no requirement. There have only been a few occasions that we have called our members to arms "outside of contract, and that is usually when there has been some sort of an outside-- for lack "of a better term, a force that wishes ill to our business. In which case, we protect our own. But "that's only happened twice since the inception of this guild itself, so I would not worry. But we "have work for you, should you need it. We have a place to stay, and beyond that you are welcome to "travel as you see fit."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are your allegiances? To yourselves, to the guild? Or to Vasselheim itself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have many allegiances. Whatever makes for the best business, to be honest. To tell you "this, we like to make money."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I respect that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We like to make sure that the city is protected from entities, creatures, beings that "would threaten the otherwise defenseless members of this fine city."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very noble.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And we like to make money."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: About that money, you said you owed us some?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Based on the hydra contract..." She tosses them amongst a random couple of you guys.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Mage Hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought I caught all three. I really tried.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You caught two and Tiberius drifted one down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much is in that one?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take a moment to count them all. Each pouch breaks down to roughly 630 gold each, if divided amongst the seven party members.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, we'll divide it evenly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're a fast counter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 630 each. Can someone note 630 for Scanlan, by the way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you. I noticed Vanessa has some cookies on her desk. Would somebody hand me one of Vanessa's cookies? Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "These cookies were sent to me as a fine gift from a friend of the guild. Sir Darin De Paul "of Vasselheim's finest performance troupe."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They set my nerves at rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't have to pay for lodging?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mind you, there are probably more comfortable "lodgings, but you do not have to pay to stay here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're staying here!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we free to go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. I have no business at the moment."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You guys! We killed a dragon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Killed a what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, they told us. Oh my god, we have so much to tell you guys.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We killed a rakshasa.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I said!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, what's it called?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's a rakshasa.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it do dances? I'm confused.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It had backward hands, so I do that because it's weird.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Saying his name is very-- you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. So you killed something that was human-sized, then. Because we killed a dragon! A big white dragon.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: He had a big tiger head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He had a tiger head?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, and he was an infernal demon and was going to threaten all of our lives.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it wasn't a guy with a cat hat. He was a demon.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: A dragon is terrible, as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, that's impressive, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Giant big giants.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Giants and dragons?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, we fought them both.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's some messed-up shit out here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We went to a really high-end club and Vax and I pretended to be married.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you did?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You did?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pretended.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What? Girls like me! That's not hard to believe! I can sell that, right? Percival, back me up, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You, you strike me as married, yes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I turned into a half-elf as well. I was very attractive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did what? Really?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've always liked your human form, Tiberius. I thought it was very attractive.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's very opposite of how I look.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I noticed-- Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your coat is all frayed and fucked up. What happened to your coat?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (stutters) Well, I may have--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Almost died. Percy, be honest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Almost died.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The dragon breathed its fire on you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, not fire actually, but ice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Another ice dragon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Scanlan took a little beating as well, didn't you, Scanlan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, he looks to you and goes, "And on that note, you're welcome to stay here. I'm going "to go ahead and use my earnings to soothe this pained, bruised pelvic region."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (gasps) Tell them I'll be along shortly for therapy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're more married than him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I shall." And he scurries out the front door of the guild hall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did any of you take a beating, or was it just us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We actually had a cleric with us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you did? We did not. What was he like? He? I'm assuming it was a he.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, he goes by the name of Kashaw. He was a rather interesting fellow. And a surly dwarf, of course.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've never met a dwarf that wasn't surly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like dwarves. Did he have an axe?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He did. He was a noble fellow. Having a bad day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Having a bad day?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. The cleric was nice. He planted one on Keyleth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Planted one what? Like a tree?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You want to explain it, druid?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you blushing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's blushing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth. Lady Keyleth!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You just got mad at me for pretend-marrying your brother, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, now that I know you're interested in some cleric, I don't care.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not interested--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have a crush on Cashew?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: See, how it worked is that he thought that she was really annoying, but really he was attracted to her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, who wouldn't be, Keyleth? You are gorgeous.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He was very nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm bummed we had two ladies with us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you guys get anything I should put in the Bag of Holding? Any cool trinkets and bits?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah. In fact, we should probably take the carpet back now that Grog has the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was a shame we didn't have it. It would have come in so handy for our adventure.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Vax, you should tell your sister.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That should come from you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a funny story. It's really funny.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, looking back it is. You know what actually, hang on, stop. Do we have any ale on us? We should have a drink real fast.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, we always have ale! I pull out the cask and I pass around a little.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's going to make it so much funnier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, go. What is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, there was this acid pit, right? And we all got on top of the carpet, like we do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, fly over the acid pit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And there were these giant magical sigils that borked the carpet. Which was fine. It was fine, because the thing started to go down--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, and then you pulled up, and you jumped--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Burned. Yeah, you see this? You see this little bit of gray? I held the carpet up, and then it's funny. We both sank together, and then the carpet went in the acid. But it was still okay. It wasn't completely destroyed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sorry, you said it went in the acid?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But then you saved it, and it was fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tiberius--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This story will be great if we could see the carpet, I think.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I pull it out of my Bag of Holding.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, you cleaned it, and that's nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It looks fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It looks a little less... glowy, though.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It doesn't fly anymore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sorry, it doesn't fry anymore?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's very comfortable to step upon, but it doesn't fly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's going to make a gorgeous tapestry.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We need to re-enchant it, is what's going on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (shouting) You lost the carpet?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We-- the carpet we stole, to be fair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The carpet--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's okay. Again, it's not a big deal. We just have to re-enchant it. I'll find somebody powerful enough to do so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's okay. We'll just pool our funds together. You guys didn't spend any money during your mission, right? We can pool our funds together and maybe find somebody. You didn't spend any money?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, we spent--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're still alive?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I have a plan, though, Vex.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We slept in a tent! We slept in a tent in the woods with the loudest librarian on god's green earth!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should have kissed her, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She talked in her sleep!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got a kiss! I didn't get a kiss.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, I'd never been kissed before, okay?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In our defense--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck just happened?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What just happened?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is what happens when you de-enchant the carpet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, there's a knock at the front of the guild hall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: God, timing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there a tavern anywhere nearby?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, hi! Hello.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How did you do that? Your ways are mysterious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How have you been? Oh my god. I think we've only been away for a week, but it feels like a year.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, you know. Here we are. Oh boy. It's so good to see you guys. I've been working on the temple, and some people are great there, and some aren't. It's been great. I'm just so glad to be back. I got a couple of days off, so I figured I needed to come hang out with the group.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How did you find us here? How did you know to find us here, Pike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The group had to pool their funds to hire a high priest of the Raven Queen to come in for the next week and cleanse the landscape of the curse that has basically prevented you guys from progressing in restoring the temple, so you have about a week to yourself.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm here for about a week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What should we do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go to Kraghammer!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we have enough time?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We have to get the money from Kraghammer, right? Pike, by the way, did you notice any blue shit around?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like holy shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like holy shit, did you walk around going like, "Oh, holy shit!"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We were doing a lot of dusting. You know, you have your little brush? And I came across some blue shit, and I was wondering what it was, so I just kept it there. I didn't clean it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You didn't pick up blue shit?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just thought it was so fascinating. I had to leave it there.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Apparently, blue shit is charmed in these lands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a very good blessing wherever it lands.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I picked it up, and I put it aside in a jar, just in case.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sure she had gloves on. You had gloves on, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I had gloves, just in case.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A blessing from Sarenrae.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's what I thought.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, what should we do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, once again, I don't want to leave, because I'm assuming we'll lose access. We don't have access to the airship for forever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's true. We should probably go see your family before we go to Kraghammer.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, wait a minute. Kraghammer is just getting our money and leaving, right?

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Your family, is that closer?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's around the corner.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we visit the shop and get some potions?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, do we need potions.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, we need to item up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just go and buy some potions.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, does the Slayer's Take have a nice stock of potions?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or an employee discount?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You inquire with Mertin, and Mertin gives a moment of thought and goes, "To be honest, I'm "pretty sure that we gave our current stock to a couple of teams throughout, including the one "that went and fought the dragon."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yes. Funny thing: we used them because it was a dragon. Do you have any more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "At the moment, no. We have a few that are on order. Should be here in the next two, three "days. So there's that. But--"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Is there a bazaar with any shops we can go to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good to hear this."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As we're doing the item stuff, I would like to stop at a blacksmith's shop.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did we want to go to a tavern, too? What time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By the time this team has arrived, I'd say it's close to 2:00 in the afternoon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, shop then tavern?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Zahra still in the Slayer's Take, or has she left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, Zahra has left already.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tiberius, you would've liked her a lot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She had a tail.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She was red.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I love tails. Ooh, and that's my favorite color. What magic did she--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very powerful magic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Moonbeam staff.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: A warlock. Interesting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. Quite charming.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She had horns. And teeth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And eyes. Let's go buy some potions.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Let's do.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where did you guys get these cookies?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ask Merkin. He can tell you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Merkin?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This guy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, hi!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The halfling who's now standing there-- the one who let you in that you didn't pay much attention to because you were more focused on seeing your friends.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm sorry, I'm so rude. I'm Pike!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Pike, it's a pleasure to meet you. The name's Mertin."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Mertin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "With a T."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Merkin.

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: Merktin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can take these cookies back."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But these cookies have been provided by a friend of the guild. If you're a friend of them, "you're a friend of the guild."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at these badass tattoos! Yeah, look at that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a brand that we got from a giant sphincter.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, sphinx. Sphinx.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sphinx?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: A sphincter is your butthole. Not who we fight, but when you go--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Boom-boom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What should we do? You go find a blacksmith and we get some potions?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Welcome to the Critical Role comedy hour, folks. Make sure you hit the two-drink minimum before you leave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think maybe that you could maybe start out on a journey with us, and then head back if you need to get back to the temple?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I have some time. I think we should just hang out like old times just for a little bit.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keyleth will fly you back lickety-split, just like that, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should we take the carpet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. About that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vex broke the carpet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) I did not!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She would never do such a thing. She wouldn't do it. You're lying.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I tried to save it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is it now just a rug?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's now just a very pretty rug.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Pike. Do you want to keep it at the temple?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought we were going to get it re-enchanted.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You'll get it re-enchanted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm pretty sure it's a very expensive enchantment.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I wonder if I could re-enchant it with the poo.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just rub poo all over it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know what it is!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Actually, Pike, now that you mention it, perhaps you could ask some divine blessing from Sarenrae. Make it a holy carpet instead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have been working in a temple.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's true, you have some sort of thing where you do it with a spell where you can ask her to help us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have a ten percent chance of succeeding, but it's awesome when it happens?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should do it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up to you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, why not?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, we take the carpet out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on, Sarenrae.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I don't have any dice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, look! Look at all these.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So if you're wishing to use your Divine Intervention, you roll two d10s, the percentile dice. Usually, you have one that has two digits and one that has one digit. Roll those together, and you're trying to roll under your level, so you're trying to roll an 11 or lower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Combined of the two?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll one at a time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the first one is--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that'd be a 60. Yeah. So as you roll out the carpet, you take a moment to hold on to your holy symbol. You sense that Sarenrae's there, but divine magic versus the initial arcane-based enchantment here? It's a little out of her realm and her focus is scattered at the moment.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm sorry. I'm just a little too excited to do this right now.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You were coming from work--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, coming from work. Tired, the time change.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sure you're doing a lot with Sarenrae.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We'll try it again later, maybe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we go get some potions so we can heal up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can attempt it once a day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good. We can try it every day while you're with us for a week. That's seven times!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't quite know how the Divine Intervention's going to work, but you know that she may come and help you in some way.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So what are we doing? We're going to go shopping for potions, and then we're going to go see Kiki's family, yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kiki? Is that what you called her when she was your wife?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What time is it, did we say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 2:00 in the afternoon now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No beard check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't. It's not a new day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it took you a few days of travel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a new day!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is there a little scruff there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like fishing wire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can't see it, but if you rub your hand on his chin, you can feel it a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I caught it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, don't blow it away!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a wish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, keep it, Pike! It'll be with you always.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wish on the carpet-- oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's going in her Sarenrae. You watch it, motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you guys step out into the thoroughfare of the Quadroads, it is beginning to rain a little bit, and you can already hear people moving through the city. You make your way towards the central portion of the Quadroads, where the large bazaar is set up. There are a number of tents and small shacks set up. Some are temporary and move in and out, but everyone seems to have their various tarps up and things to help protect, overhangs, from any prospect of customers from getting rained on too heavily. However, the floor of this city, which is already pretty dusty and dirty in its own right, has now become sludge-like mud, and there's this constant (squelching) as you're walking through the city. It's easy enough for you, Tiberius, to go ahead and find a blacksmith. Generally, there aren't too many in this area. A lot of those tend to be pushed up more towards the Braving Grounds, so it's easy to find the one or two plumes of black smoke--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I could send him to the blacksmith I went to.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Along the way, I would also like to be looking out for any animal shopkeeps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Animal?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A pet store?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. Make a perception check.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you shopping for a little buddy?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I am. That is nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you're walking along, nothing's really catching your eye. You do manage to go to the blacksmith that Percy sent you to. What are you seeking in particular?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: A dragonite, raven.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At the blacksmith's?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: The blacksmith's? Oh. I think I can only do short swords and looking at a crossbow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know how to use a blade, Tiberius?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I do. Oh, quarterstaff. I think that's what I'm proficient in. So I'm going to, crossbow, quarterstaff, some darts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Blacksmithing is more for construction. The blacksmith there says, "Well, I "mean, I can certainly make some for you, but there's already plenty of ready-made ones over at the "general store across the way." And he points to a smaller building.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I would like a quarterstaff, though, with bladed ends. It is why I came to you, sir.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right." And the scruffy-chinned human rubs his half-beard and thinks it over. "I can "probably fashion something. I can't tell you how wieldy it'll be, but we can certainly try. Give me "about-- four hours, probably, with a ready-made quarterstaff?"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wonderful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. For the custom, put you back about, say, 80 gold for the custom job."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wonderful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You wanted a crossbow, you said. You want a heavy crossbow or--"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh. What do you prefer? I'm a sorcerer, so I've got to keep it light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then you're probably going to go with a regular hand-crossbow. Go talk to that general "store over there." And he sends you across the way. You head over to the general store. You purchase, base price for a hand-crossbow is 75 gold pieces, so mark that off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm walking over just to watch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. A short sword is easy enough to purchase, that is ten gold pieces.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got a taste for the knocking-about, fighting that thing, didn't you?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I don't like being unarmed anymore. And darts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also have to manage to get your ammunition, as well.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, I need bolts. Bolts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you buy a lot, you can put them in your Bag of Holding. That's what I do. Speaking of, how's my supply in there? Is it pretty good, still?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your supply of what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My arrows in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Yeah, they're all over the fucking place.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: How much for 40 bolts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 40 bolts, I'd say I put those-- I'd say for 40, two gold. Bolts aren't too expensive. It's bulk bin.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay, then a hundred.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are only currently 80 available.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll buy the whole lot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I bought them for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While they're shopping, I just want to drill Keyleth a little more about her smooch that she got.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's more interesting than the bolts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So wait, he kissed you or you kissed him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, he kissed me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He kissed you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You were kissed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A cleric kissed her!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know who his deity was? Maybe Pike knows him!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He was a cleric. But he wasn't a cleric to Sarenrae, he was actually a cleric to this demon goddess named Vesh.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've never heard of Vesh.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I thought I did for two seconds, and then I was like, oh wait, no I don't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was interesting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does Vesh have a lot of followers?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's an old god; you've probably never heard of it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's what I was thinking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's also married to her?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he kissed you? Wait. A guy that's married to a god kissed you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I see how this could work out poorly.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if she gets mad?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've thought about that a little bit, and then tried not to think about that a lot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tell her to get in line.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't like that face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What? I'm just enjoying some water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I shouldn't have even said anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was awesome, though. Then he just walked off into the sunset.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was it good? It was a good kiss?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispers) I've never been kissed before, so I don't know. It was really good. Made me tingly inside.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, that's a great feeling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Very nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So while this is happening--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's not listening. We're girl pow-wowing right now.

lines.name: ASHLEY, MARISHA
lines.text: Girl time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're shopping for potions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What else do you need? It's all on me. If you hadn't stopped that shithead from leaving, I wouldn't have put a dagger in the back of his head, and we would've been looking over our shoulders for who knows how long, so everything's on me. Whatever you want, tell me. Not a carpet. I can't afford it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: People don't manufacture them left and right; it's a time-consuming process, and a lot of them are exported, so finding them here is a little difficult, and they're usually part of other stores that sell it as part of their stock. You guys, before you journeyed out last time, cleaned out the hag.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's something else we have to tell you guys about!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I look around the street and see if there are any shady types lurking about.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check. Asking and looking around, no one seems particularly helpful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excuse me. I'm looking for potions. Can I get some service?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some individuals push you aside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pull Percy aside. No, remember this town? They don't like magic and stuff and they get weird about potions. And all the-- what are they called? The Bastions all control the trade of potions, so people get weird. It's weird and illegal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you come up to a gentleman. He's dressed in a fine velvet bright-red-and-maroon tunic, and he's carrying a small satchel at his side, and he's standing outside of a small tent and he's like, "Anyone? Come forth! I carry oddities of all kinds! If you wish to see what I "have for sale, I'll be happy to sell them!" Turns and sees you. "Oh. You, sir! You look like you're "in an inquiring mood."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What'd you call me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sir. It's a respectful term."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What were you saying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I should probably go."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, wait, you said you have oddities.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have them sent in from all over the "continents."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go on, then. Like what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Like--" And he reaches into his pouch and pulls out this small jar that contains a liquid, and you can see something sort of floating in this liquid. It's a little bit cloudy. "This is the eye "of a basilisk I procured from the distant north of Tal'Dorei."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've already got one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we have two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, then. What are you looking for?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Funny thing. I like to work out a lot, and I like to go lift boulders in the forest sometimes, so would you have anything that might give me a temporary increase to my already magnificent strength?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let me see." And he rummages through this small tent on the side. You see it's more of a storage tent-slash-bedroom-slash-whatever it takes to set up shop really quickly. This guy's definitely a traveling solo merchant.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like the dude in the beginning of Aladdin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That, with a little more of a fake upper-crust, Renaissance-man visualization. He reaches back. You hear him rummaging through some glassware and he goes, "I actually have a few "potions at my disposal here." He dips under one of the nearby tents that has an overhang, to get out of the rain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we hear this at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a little ways out of the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Welcome to Agrabah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I happen to have one such potion. In fact, I have on good authority, it will restore some of "your own damaged internal, should you find yourself in a dangerous situation."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What else have you got?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (stutters)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are off shopping elsewhere. You guys are probably together, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How much was that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This one would run you 500 gold pieces."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it a superior healing potion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this one is a greater.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not spending 500 gold on a greater healing potion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, pull a Vex. Get that number down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. For you, sir, I perhaps have this." He pulls out a vial that has a gray, sparkling, almost like it has an iron filing sediment inside this thick, syrupy liquid. It looks like it would taste awful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ironschlager.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Yes. Yes, it is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why do they not make that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because they'd put a lot of iron in it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Some people need iron.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This, I've been told, has been crafted from and distilled from the blood of many a tyrant-like "stone giant from the far off mountains of the hinterlands. This, when swallowed, should imbue "you with the strength of a thousand men."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A thousand? That's just above, like, four?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sort of."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How much?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For this one? This, I'd say, would run you a simple 6,000 gold pieces."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not that I'm not a man of incredible wealth. Would you be interested in anything besides coin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Speaking of which do you offer?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I have this fancy bag myself. I happen to have parts of an umber hulk. Pieces of dragon, if you might be interested in that. I also have jewels and fancy robes, if you need a change.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My robes are quite fancy enough, but thank you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. I have an orc head. And I reach into the Bag of Holding and pull out the orc head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Persuasion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's actually plus one for persuasion. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? All right. He goes, "Pieces of dragon, you say?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we do. We have 14 dragon teeth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't tell him all the numbers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're not there. Four cups of blood. It's probably more like a gel right now. Several pounds of scales, and maybe a few claws. I'd have to look; there's so many.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How about this? For direct trade, no coin exchange necessary: all 14 of your dragon's teeth, and perhaps two of those blood vials."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whispering) What would Vex do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whispering) Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All of the dragon's teeth and three of the vials of blood?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ugh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Done.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ugh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He accepts all of the dragon's teeth, three of the four vials of blood-- you can mark those off the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter) You're such a dick!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're getting you a leash!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Goodbye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All gone, but you currently now have in your possession one Potion of Stone Giant Strength.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stone Giant Strength. Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You drive a hard bargain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I find that in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. When imbibed you essentially, your strength becomes equivalent to 23.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One time. One big time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One use, or is it multiple?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One hour.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One hour, so my strength becomes 23.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can he get multiple drinks out of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's one use.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What happens if I were to just pinky in?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give it a little number?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Give it a little taste.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your gums will get a little tingly for a while. Probably be a little hyper.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Would there be any result?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know, do you want to try?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to wait and try it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does that change my modifier at all? When it goes up that much?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah. Your modifier would become plus six is what it would be, a plus six modifier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Money well spent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you take it and you shake it around, you can see on the inside of that sparkling metallic-- there's a small object floating around and looking inside, it looks like it's a clipping of a fingernail or a toenail of whatever giant the potion was brewed from. Like a tequila bottle worm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's the part everybody wants.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I've just been sitting here watching this, shocked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look what I got. Let's go join the others.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you for your patronage. Enjoy the rest of your stay here in Vasselheim I hope to do "business with you again in the near future." He turns around and closes the thing. He takes his satchel and he starts closing down his tent and putting things away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, you fucking-- track him down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got no idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Closes everything down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we see him? Are we walking up? Can we walk up as it's happening?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As she walks up, I grab Vex and I go, you will be so proud. I just haggled down this guy so well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you point back and look, you can see now a cart is being wheeled away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I Hunter's Mark him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why? Why would you Hunter's Mark him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What level?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What level what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What level Hunter's Mark? Basic level?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are in the middle of a city where people might not take unwarranted aggression well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Level-3 Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He puts his hand out and feels the rain for a strange temperature change, and continues pushing the cart, pushes it through the mud, rolling up the rest of the thoroughfare and disappears into the city. But you have a pretty good idea of where he's going.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So anyway, I was working with him, and you always try and get more for our money, (haltingly) and I definitely got more for our-- more-- gave more money--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did you do? See? I'm glad I Hunter's Marked him. What did you trade? What did you get?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I gave him tiny bits of dragon for this amazing flask of Stone Giant Strength.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is wrong with all of you?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was upset about the carpet, and I wasn't-- he's huge! What was I going to say?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Percy got a vial of Greater Healing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I didn't. It was expensive and-- oh god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I need a drink.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To the tavern?

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: To the tavern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys eventually catch up. You acquire your staff over the next few hours or so as people are resting, having drinks and such. It acts as a regular quarterstaff, except you can choose whether you want it to do bludgeoning or slashing damage.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay, cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I fall in step next to Vex and look at her for a second. What's burning your arse?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everybody's breaking things, everybody's spending all our money.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We have 30,000 gold pieces waiting for us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't have it now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 30,000 gold pieces from where?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: From when we were in Kraghammer.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, you didn't collect them yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So it's credit, there's credit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's just waiting for us. I mean, we're basically the richest people ever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We still have a keep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We do, we have a keep! We have a beautiful keep, with furniture, and servants.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you say servants, the barmaid who's coming over and filling up your drink goes, "We prefer barmaid, but thank you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, excuse me! Oh, can we have a goblet of your strongest stank for this one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks over at her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She started before we got here. Just keep it coming. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, all right."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How much are they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For your strongest? Per glass, I'll put that at about--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't tell him the price of anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I lift up the cup and keep putting it in, and say, a round of the strongest on me. I've got that, as well.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll take a water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You get water, you all managed to get your drinks. A very, very thick, syrupy mead-type alcohol. Altogether for those drinks, Vax, it comes down to 15 gold for alcohol, which is expensive for a round. This is very fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should've let me haggle that down. I would have got it to 19 gold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, you're thinking about it the wrong way, Grog. It's the other way. You want to go down, not up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love you, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA, ORION, ASHLEY
lines.text: I love you, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I missed you all so much.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Pike, if we're to just be roundabout and mill about today, is that what you wish, Pike? After our tavern? What would you care to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stay-cation.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, wait. Where's Scanlan?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He went to the park.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, he needed a little-- it was really rough going, from what I hear anyway, and he needed a little therapy?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, he needed a massage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought he was going to the house where they--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Lady favors.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I get it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We could easily get there and take an airship back, if we choose to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We were also talking about visiting Keyleth's family. Can you get away long enough to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe start the trip with us?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think I can. And then, if I have to leave, at least I can maybe meet your family for a little bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Never-Been-Kissed. How's that sound?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they your family, technically?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're our sister tribe. Because we all separated.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tell us again. Sorry, explain it again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Essentially, about 900 years ago or so, roughly a thousand years ago, we were a nomadic people. And then there was some sort of great sundering-- we're actually still not 100% sure; a lot of information was lost. And the elemental planes started bleeding with this plane, and oh, Vex is falling asleep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whoa. Hey, Stubby. Wake up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Once every generation, someone is nominated to go out and make contact with the sister tribes in order to establish further communication, check in, learn about each other's cultures.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Interesting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're from the same people, but we each have our individual cultures because we've been separated for so long, at this point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So these ones are Fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: These ones are Fire, yes, so they're located in a volcanic region, and you can start to feel an energy from where the planes start to shift, and it gets a little unbalanced. That's where we each live, and I'm from the ones where we protect the Air portals.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Lady Keyleth, did you just say where the planes shift?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, because where all the planes-- almost like a Venn diagram, if you want to think about it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Who is this, who is Van Diagram.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He was one of the Ashari?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He was.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Van Diagram was one of the Ashari.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Very great man.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Quick question about the planes. Will we travel there, is there any way to, perhaps, get to the fey woods through these planes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't necessarily overlap with the fey. We protect where it overlaps. You could get to the fire elemental plane easier from this place, and my town you can get to the plane of Air--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (belches)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a good one, Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope. Not me.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That was Vex.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was a good one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's nappies time. Nappy time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you feeling okay, Vex?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just give her an hour. She'll be fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She just needs some time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Side note: I'm two inches taller, and I've always called you Stubby.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come here, Stubby.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But anyway, the last person to go on the Aramente was my mother, and she never returned, so we haven't really had contact with the Fire Ashari for a while.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So you're pretty anxious to go, then, yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have no idea what they're going to be like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But you know about where they are, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've gotten rough directions. We'll have to probably figure it out along the way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we hoofing it? Are we flying?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We could do whatever you wish, Grog. Do you have a particular ability called Magic Weapon?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I have Spiritual Weapon. So I guess, yes?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: They're different things.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well. What do you want? What are you looking for?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I wanted you to bless my quarterstaff. Make it magical. I need my staff enchanted. I would like you to enchant my staff, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY, TRAVIS
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know what that means.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've been around Scanlan long enough.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The holy symbol goes (shattering sound).

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I mean in a strictly platonic, arcane sense.

lines.name: MATT
