You see occasionally a couple of bubbles (lava bubbling) in the lava behind him, and even his form is shifting from behind as the air itself ripples and changes. He looks at you and says, "Sit. Focus. Ask permission."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do as he says.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a wisdom check. Roll a d20. Add your wisdom bonus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27. As you sit down and close your eyes, you begin to focus your mind towards the center of this mountain, the heart of the fire that gives it its life, and as you all watch, a minute passes of silence before suddenly the ground shifts again and you can see the lava begin to grow more and more active, sending off little spittles of rock.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I push it out and continue to focus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Especially you, Vax, who had previously had some unhappy run-ins with molten rock. It's a genuine fear that you hadn't quite acknowledged since that moment, and you begin to feel really uncomfortable being this close to this opening. As you continue to focus, you hear Cerkonos's voice again, calm and methodical. "Ask permission." I'd like you to go ahead and roll a nature check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cerkonos is still-- the back of him you can only imagine is either burnt to a crisp by the sheer proximity of the heat, but he is unmoved.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I push it out and continue to focus. Just focus and meditate on asking permission.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Keyleth of the Air Ashari. Ask permission!" Go ahead and roll one more wisdom check. d20 plus five. This time, with advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wisdom, five. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. At this point, you guys notice one final shift of the ground, and the trees actually crack, and you see bits of broken branch and tree begin to fall and hit the ground around you. The air is beginning to pick up, and even though you try and cover your face the ash is still pushing through and your eyes are starting to hurt. You feel suddenly this blockage, this tension, like the mountain was fighting you, give way. And in that moment you (gasps) breathe in and open your eyes, and you all notice that the lava that has been slowly circling now (whoosh) pulls down into a vortex that disappears into the crevasse and is now a spinning whirlpool of molten rock in the crevasse, as Cerkonos still stands there. Cerkonos now steps aside and seems to vanish from your sight in but an instant, his voice lingering in the air, saying, "Now, you may enter." Looking down, you lean over and you can see this slow spiral of molten rock. It seems to disappear 15 to 20 feet below, you cannot see the bottom of it, and when you try and lean forward the heat is so intense that you have to close your eyes; you're forced to. There is a leap of faith here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before I leap down, I cast Protection from Flame on myself? Or Protection from Energy, and I'm going to use fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which gives you fire resistance?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Gives me fire resistance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good to know. And then... Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I close my eyes and let myself fall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys watch as Keyleth steps forward and tumbles off the edge, into the vortex of molten rock. (whoosh) She's gone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I look to my sister and grab her by the shoulder and squeeze. Then I dive in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit. Are we doing this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a wisdom saving throw, as this is fighting a very strong fear of yours.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because we had the Heroes' Feast, are we not frightened?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, that's true. You have advantage on all of our wisdom saving throws, from the Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You shrug it off, and the thought of your sister, the thought of Keyleth, the thought of the moments of connection you guys have had, you push through that pain and you leap and swan dive into the vortex.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I cast Stoneskin. (whoosh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you guys jump in. You don't need to roll anything. It was only because of his fear he had to. The rest of you leap into this vortex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket! Jump? Come. I smack him on the butt, and I jump in after him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Trinket (roaring) leaps in, looking over his shoulder at you like, what have you done?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're brave! Very brave!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all individually leap through, it's interesting. There's a falling sensation, and then gravity seems to shift. You're facing downward, but you feel gravity begin to pull you to the side, and your feet find purchase on what seems like the lava spiral, but it doesn't burn. You step on it like it's hard rock, shifting slowly beneath your feet, where you have to continuously change your step, like a slowly rotating tunnel you're walking through, and you're walking downward, downward, this way. And you see light before you, very bright light, and you move towards it and move towards it, and your eyes try and focus, and you cover your vision, and eventually you step out of this tunnel and it takes a moment for your eyes to focus, and looking around you, you see a vast barren wasteland of black cinders, embers, and ash, for miles and miles around you. Thin rivers of lava cut across the plains like blood splatter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, we're in the Plane of Fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wind blows extremely strongly, and the atmosphere is dry and nearly unbearably hot, like the hottest desert you've ever imagined. An intolerably blazing sun is coming to rest near a distant mountain range, but your eyes catch an even more distant danger: a black, roiling cinderstorm a few miles off, red lightning flashing within its turbulent ash clouds. It looks to be moving away from you, thankfully, but you do indeed find yourself standing in the center of the Elemental Plane of Fire. A voice echoes from behind you, and you look over your shoulder, and you can see there is a circular doorway still held aloft there, shifting slowly, the vortex you stepped out of still locked in place. A voice says, "Stay together. Follow the footsteps. When "you find the stone spire, there you will find your trial."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay...

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Just to note: when I cast Stoneskin, I didn't do the concentration. I let go of the Alter Self.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. That was illusion dust, so it's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we follow footsteps; I can track footprints.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's hard to tell. Can I sit and take a minute to meditate, and see if I can connect with my mother and see if I can find some sort of trace? Essence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another wisdom check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I want to use Primeval Awareness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have advantage, right? I'll take that 15. Thank you. It was a one. So that's 28.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I use Primeval Awareness to see if there's any aberrations, celestials, elementals, fiends, undead? Any scary things? Dragons? Within six miles. No. A mile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sense there is a very, very faint comfort in this path, so you know it's been walked before. You're unable to glean anything beyond that, but you know you're on the right path, but your mother's been gone a long time. Surprising you've even caught wind of this type of an essence lingering.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Any direction of which way the essence might be blowing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to tell. Make an investigation check. You sense within the mile-- because it's not like blips on a radar, you just generally sense something nearby. In three different directions, elemental presence. Strong elemental presence. You glance up. Very strong elemental presence as all of you can see, about a quarter mile, half mile away, you see there's something drifting in the sky that is burning like a beacon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a fire elemental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Every inhale burns the inside of your lungs.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh! (pop)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Tiberius has a big old bottle in his mouth now. Like a magical pacifier, and you've got your mask on, which is helping. It is still very hot here, and under all the armor you're wearing, you immediately break into a very heavy sweat. You notice though that, through your investigation and the connection with your mother and the directional sense, while there are no tracks, there are small pools of lava that progress in a pattern, one that would even resemble footsteps of a giant or some sort of large creature.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's head that way. Let's follow this lava trail. Looks promising.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're behind you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys begin pushing forward, blazing sun bearing down on you, heading towards the direction of these pools of lava, and they scatter a bit, but there is a general direction you are able to follow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (quietly) There's no way to stealth here, is there? Cover ourselves in ash or something to make us less visible?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it possible to cover us in ash and try to make us less visible to the elementals?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have Pass Without a Trace right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do have Pass Without a Trace. I can cast that on us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you cast Pass Without a Trace on the group. As you do, the magic pools, a bunch of the ashes (whoosh) from the ground surround each of you, and there's this gentle cloud of ash that just tends to drift off your body and perpetually replace itself from the surrounding terrain. It does offer you some blanket of visual obscuring from any sort of high vantage point or distant vantage point. Up close, not so much. I'll have all of you guys roll a stealth check. With a plus ten bonus from the spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cloak of Elvenkind is with advantage; would that take place here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the disadvantage? Because you have heavy armor on.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let me do it again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The feast thing? No?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you still get the other one, which is still good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus ten, 38.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (mocking) Oh, I'm such a rogue. What did you get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you guys continue moving forward, the wind still buffeting you to the side, you hear this (distant animal screeching). You glance in the distance and you can see, flying through the sky, a very, very large, ancient even, red-scaled draconic beast. For those who are familiar with the training, the Elemental Plane of Fire does seem to be a very prominent home to such dragons as the red. You guys notice this and stop in place and keep low. As time passes, eventually it moves past, heading towards the distant mountain range. Thank god you cast that spell. You wait a little while, until it's out of sight and beyond your vision. You keep pushing forward another 20 to 30 minutes or so through this hellish landscape. The heat is starting to get to you guys. I need everyone to go ahead and make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I get anything for having my protection from fire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say, give you advantage for this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My mask doesn't give me any advantage, does it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not for heat. This is the general atmospheric heat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all are feeling the heat starting to get to you, but currently it doesn't seem to be fully affecting you; you get the feeling the longer you stay here, the more it's going to have an effect on you. However, you're still pushing through without a problem. You push on for another ten minutes or so before you come across a few more of these streams of lava, and there, about 20 to 30 feet ahead of you, you see a single stone obelisk that rises out of the ground about 15 feet up, and towards the top you see embedded in it a single, mildly glowing, what looks like a fist- or heart-sized ruby that is embedded into it like a beacon, or a small fiery lighthouse in the center of this open plain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's pretty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That looks like a stone spire to me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, it's shiny.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's rather shiny, yeah. Let's go there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you guys approach, stepping towards the obelisk, around the back of it, make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, Jesus ballsacks. All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, sweet baby Jesus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, Jesus Ballsacks, who art in heaven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Don't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does this make you feel better?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (giggling) Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God damn it, Wheaton.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: God damn it, Wheaton. Here.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Do you need me to light that on fire again for you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's going.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Got to get my dice in order.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have walls!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Broken, ruined walls that appear from the landscape. I need... some initiative scores from you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jeez Louise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So we have 25 to 20?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Crickets. Crickets have 25 to 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You had 19? All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's addictive, isn't it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's fun to say. Thanks, bud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, 15, Tiberius. All right. Ten to five?

lines.name: ASHLEY, TALIESIN
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) Hi!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Five!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, who's left?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I rolled a one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He rolled a one, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're sitting here like, is this a Cirque du Soleil thing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're like, oh cool! It's fire.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Burning Man!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the round, Cerkonos in his oversized fire elemental form darts forward towards the center (flame sounds). An unnatural pace of movement as the flames seem to flicker and dart and reform at the foot of the rest of the group, at which point he brings his arms in and (roaring flame) releases a torrent of flame that bursts out in a 20-foot radius from him, catching all of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have immunity to what, now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She has immunity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Poison, disease, and fright. All right. I need everyone to roll a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Hey! Internet! There's my natural one.

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: No!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Suck it. It happens.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's better.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stealth. Dexterity. Damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So. Percy, what did you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. I need everyone who rolled a 16 or higher, raise your hand. Okay, so only Percy and Tiberius. All of you guys take 13 points of fire damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Who rolled high?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, who rolled high. 13 points of fire damage from the blast outward. Tiberius and Percy, you both take 25 points of fire damage--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (laughs) Resist. 13 for me, anyway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take half, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take half, because of fire resistance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many points?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25, and you are both set on fire as all of a sudden your clothing and armor (whoosh) burst into flames, and you are considered burning.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Burning?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do you put yourself out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take an action to put yourself out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stop, drop and roll, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to basically take your action, your whole turn, trying to put the flames out. That ends Cerkonos's turn. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keyleth's right up against that elemental in front of her, right? I'm going to run right behind her--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're on fire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm not. I made the save. I click my boots together and I run up--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you roll for Trinket, as well? Go ahead and roll Trinket's roll. So you move up over here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good. Trinket definitely saved that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did Trinket make? You're behind?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, so I'm going to swing up underneath Keyleth's arm, and then I've already clicked the boots, so dagger, dagger... dagger.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like the comma there. The comma really brought it together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket takes 13 points of fire damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So 22 on the first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 on the first? That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That hits. All right, there's the sneak attack right there. This is the Keen Dagger. Good, there's ten, plus-- did he make an attack already? He did, right? Damn it. Ten. 13, 14, 20. 20 points of damage on the first strike. Second strike probably misses. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 misses, yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Third strike is a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 does hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does hit. All right, and that is nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine damage. Okay. As you (whoosh) swing up, you hit him with the first dagger, strike and miss with the second, and the third one you slam up into its flaming torso, finding some sort of physical purchase and slicing through. However, with each hit, the fire that bursts back burns you. The first hit you take three points of fire damage, second hit deals six points of fire damage to you from hitting it with a melee attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So three plus six, total of nine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Total of nine points of fire damage. That ends your turn, Vax. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Can I back away from him, or am I going to get hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he does not have that far of a reach.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so I back up. I'm going to back up against the wall so I can duck behind it if I need to, and I call Trinket with me, for sure. And then I am going to lightning arrow him? I'm going to lightning arrow-- no. Jesus. I Hunter's Mark him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. He is Hunter's Marked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now he is surrounded by all of our friends?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. He has three of them currently surrounding him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Balls. I'm going to have to Hunter's Mark one of the little ones, then, and aim for one of them. And I'm going to Hail of Thorns them. The one closest to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a 25!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Why do I already forget what I'm doing. Normal attack. Okay. 17 for the normal attack--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus Hunter's Mark damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus Hunter's Mark damage. Six for Hunter's Mark, and then I get 3d10 for the Hail of Thorns.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, that's a ten, that's a ten, this is a ten. Balls. Ten, 12, 13. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It slams into the elemental, which then bursts into the side, you can see its form (whoosh), open up from the inside, and then (contracting sound), reform into an elemental, as the rest of the thorns shoot out, (thorns impacting) hitting the side of the stone pillar to the side of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And just one more regular attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So it's a bonus action to do the spell, and then it's first attack hit, boom, second attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 20! (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hot diggity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So dice times two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's it? I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So two damage plus your bonus, plus your Hunter's Mark. Unless Hunter's Mark's once per turn; let me check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 14 for the second hit. That's a lame critical.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it was fantastic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius, you're up. Beginning of your turn, you take five points-- actually, no. You take eight points of fire damage, reduced by four, for being on fire.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I'm like, oh, that tickles. I don't expend an action to do that, and instead I look at the main dude and I'm going to be like, here's something she taught me. (babbling) And I use a scroll, and I'm going to cast Blight (magic sound) on him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did teach him that.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I have two Blight scrolls. I'm reading super fast. (babbling)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like a cattle auctioneer. (imitates auctioneer)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's okay. I have something else that's effective.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you took your four damage from the fire. You pull out the scroll. First, you need to roll to see if you can do the scroll properly, so go ahead and roll a d20, and add your plus five.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22, yeah. Not a problem. You take the spell, you pull out the scroll, read it, and the scroll itself you can see is starting to burn on its own just being pulled out in the heated atmosphere that is this Plane of Fire, but before it can burn entirely, you finish the spell. It disappears in a flash of light and ash, and then Blight goes and takes effect.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As I'm going to do that, I'm going to heighten it, and spend three sorcerer points so it gives him disadvantage--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say, because the Blight spell is a scroll, you cannot use metamagic. It's magic from your bloodstream is what gives you that ability.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Fair enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the DC on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So what I can do, is I can-- if I can't heighten an initial spell, I can power a spell that's already been cast with my sorcerer's point, right? You can empower a spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: True, but still spells that you've cast from yourself. The metamagic is how you enhance it as you cast it out of yourself. If it's from a scroll--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (counting) 25 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Parts of it flicker, and then it (growls) angrily pushes through.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Where am I relative to everybody else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're right here.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay, cool. What I will do, because I can do this, is I will quicken spell, and I will spend two sorcery points to Misty Step behind where Vex is. (whoosh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over there?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yep. And in view of everybody else, where I can still cast stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There? Okay. Cool.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. That brings us to these guys' turn. (flames) Right there. Going to move up towards Percy. Coming around the side, is going to make two touch attacks against you, Percy. That is a 13.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that is a 25, with a 19.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 25 definitely hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends its turn. The other one, however, rushes up and it's doing a touch attack against Keyleth and Vex. Vax, I mean. Sorry. Versus Keyleth, that is a 16 versus armor class?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss. 17. (whoosh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 20 versus you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Vax, you take 12 points of fire damage, and your cloak bursts into flame.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, fuck a duck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're like, shit, now the fire's crawling up around you. That brings us to Percy and Pike's turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god. (laughs) Stop, drop and roll!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, what are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am on fire, aren't I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beginning of your turn, you take ten points of fire damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God damn it. And it takes an entire action to put myself out? Can I run? He's going to get an attack of opportunity on me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He would get an attack of opportunity on you if you ran, yeah, but also ranged attacks at point blank are at disadvantage, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I know. Fuck it. I'm going to run first, and then put myself out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you're running which way?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm running towards the wall. I'm getting some distance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, and I'm doing a "stop, drop and roll" on my way to put myself out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fire safety, kids.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 21.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it! Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 12 points of fire damage as it just swings out and hits you in the back. You feel the flames now licking beneath your armor. You're sweating profusely and you feel the burn marks as the skin begins to boil and crack beneath the armor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And you've moved me as far in that direction as I can go, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be over here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. I'm also going to spend my bonus action for second wind, because fuck. So that's 19 points that I gain back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Percy's turn. Pike, what you got?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, Pike!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. So I have the Frost Brand Sword, so I'm resistant to fire damage if I'm holding it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. You have half damage from fire.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But I would like to use a Guiding Bolt, because it's a little bit more damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Go ahead and roll your Guiding Bolt attack. Against which guy? These three here are visible.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Let's do the guy right there. The big guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Big guy right there? Okay. Go ahead and roll your attack. You add your spell attack modifier to it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's only 15. 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 15 does hit, yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yay! Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 4d6 radiant damage, and the next attack against it has advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage, all righty. Good to know. Well done. That's your turn. Do you wish to move anywhere, or are you going to stay where you are, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know what, so sorry. I was casting that at a three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a level 3? So add an additional 2d6 to it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, sorry. 18.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Total.

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: 18 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool, gotcha. All right. You want to move or you going to stay where you are, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where am I at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're right here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Keyleth, you're up. Grog, you're on deck.

lines.text: I look at Cerkonos, and give him a nod, and I say, okay. And I concentrate, and my entire form goes water, and I turn into a water elemental.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Skadoosh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Badass.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I immediately rush into Cerkonos's space, and do Whelm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So he has to do a DC 15 saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Dex?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Strength.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We all look great and lose five pounds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody's glistening.

lines.text: Our pores look better than they ever have.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sweat it out, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 2d8. Not bad. 12 plus four. 16.

lines.text: Does he take extra damage because I'm water? Because he has water susceptibility?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Water susceptibility, essentially, he takes one point of cold damage on top of that, and if he tries to moves away from you, he moves slower.

lines.text: You're swirling water around him right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's water versus fire elemental right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, because it is a fire elemental, it is immune to being grappled. Because it is just fire, you can't really grab around it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (impact) Water right through his form. Steam rolls off of me. (hiss)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it is uncomfortable being in this plane as a water elemental, but you're pushing through it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take how much? Four damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was six damage. Which should be halved, because you have the resistance still on you, so that's three damage to you... You also entered its space, so you also are on fire. Strangely enough, you are a water elemental that's caught fire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's strange. The water is steaming, and the flames are having a hard time rolling. I'm going to say... I'm going to say you can't. That's stupid. A water elemental is not going to catch fire. That makes no sense. I'm going to say, for the sake of this battle, you are immune to being set on fire. Fucking water elemental. All right, that ends your turn. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look over, and I see as Vax starts slashing into the fire beastie, I know this is going to hurt, and I go into a rage. And I know I'm going to burn, but I take my three giant swings with my battleaxe.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Certainly. Three strikes at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits. Damage on all three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take ten damage from the first strike, eight damage-- and because this is magical, it's not reduced. So that's 18, plus another ten. 28 total points of fire damage from striking at it. All right. That ends your turn, Grog. Up to the top of the round, that's now come to Cerkonos. Cerkonos is going to stay right where it is. It's going to go ahead and make three melee touch attacks. It's going to be... probably going to be one against each of you, actually. So against Keyleth, that is a 24 to hit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that would be 12 points of fire damage, reduced to six because of your spell, but you're not ignited.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Against everyone near him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just reaching out. Cocked dice. That is 18 against you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hell yeah, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was that a crit?

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There goes that beard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shut up! Don't tell him that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 points of fire damage, and you are set on fire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The beard is okay, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, but the flames are licking up the sides of your shoulders.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, come on, man. Have you no mercy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I made a stupid pun, and you tripped me and made me eat shit. Enjoy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cerkonos is going to stay there, just taking you all on at once. That brings us to Vax. To start your turn, you take nine points of fire damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Excellent. That's excellent news. I'm going to use my bonus action to disengage. I've got three things I can do here because of the Boots of Haste, so use bonus action to disengage. I'm going to use one action to run like fuck over to that wall and jump to the side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not an attack. You have a bonus action and an action. So you can disengage and then move, then you have your action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I can still move my normal speed, right? All right, so I'm going to run as far as I can towards that wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The other wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, that wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four, five, six. That'll put you right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then I'm going to roll on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you use your action to put out the flame.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (choked) It's okay, right? The cloak's okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cloak's fine. It's a little burnt, but it's okay. The flames are gone now. You're no longer taking fire damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's my woobie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your turn. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey, now. Not cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, I'm going to lightning arrow? Is that going to do anything to fire? I'm going to lightning arrow the one that I've Hunter's Marked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that is 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so that one right there? All right, that hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. So. Do I do my regular attack on that, as well, or do I just do the damage from the lightning?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. The arrow is no longer there; it is now just a bolt of lightning halfway through the arc.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Correct. 4d8.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 4d8 damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is so nerve-wracking. (counting) 25 on the lightning arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Grog, go ahead and make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I get advantage on that because I'm raging?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. What's your spell DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah. So he makes the save, go ahead and roll 2d8, and he takes half damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry, I couldn't see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Within ten feet of it. Every creature within ten feet of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't think that was ten feet. I'm sorry. Oh good, that's nothing. Two!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take two points of lightning damage as (flicker) part of the lightning arrow arcs off and tickles your shoulder. You barely even notice, you're raged out and focused on him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, with the being on fire, it's really not that bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do another attack out of the Blood-Seeking Bow. (singing) That's a 27! (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY, LAURA
lines.text: (singing) 27!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did Hunter's Mark damage on the last one, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. 16 with Blood-Seeking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. So it's now bleeding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's a bleeding fireball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Interesting thing about this. I will consider bleeding as part of its conditional immunities, because it does not have blood. It is a flaming elemental.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Waste.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it still took damage. You can see now, the flames of this are starting to flicker a little bit; it's having hard time keeping itself cohesive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On the smaller one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. That ends your turn, do you want to move anywhere, you staying there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go around the back of the wall with Trinket. Oh no, I knocked it down on myself! Can I get around to the other side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as you can get with your run right now, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, that's cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that ends your turn. Tiberius, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't worry about hurting me, if that's what you're afraid of.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to scooch my booch closer to the wall to get quarter cover. I think that'll put me in about where I need to be to see all three of them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that Draconic?

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Scooch my booch.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Scooch my boocher. Two, three, four. Okay, so I'm going to cast-- two, four, six-- Glacial Blast (hiss) in the arc to hit all three of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hit all three of these guys? What's the arc on that one?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: 30 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30-foot arc? Okay, you can get these two.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: If I have to move, can I move closer to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have to get into melee with this to hit all three, which would be disadvantage if it's an attack roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just take the two.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll take the two. I'll do that. And then, I'm going to spend three points to heighten the spell and that gives them disadvantage on their saving throw, so I'm going to do that right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what's the saving throw? Dex?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 dex. Okay, go ahead and roll damage, and it's half damage for that, right?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, if they save.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's pretty good.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Ten, 18, what's that? 30, 35. 35.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 35. Okay. Keyleth and Grog also make dexterity saving throws.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two. Fails on Cerkonos.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a natural 17 for the fire elemental, though; it takes half damage there. So what's the total on there?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And that was at disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Below it, you see standing in its place the druid that was once there, (thud) drops down on its knees, and looks up at you with a nod.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're coming back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll? With disadvantage on the saving throw, guys, by the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Disadvantage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's worse. 14.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This druid is going to go ahead and is going to transform into an eagle and head back in the path from where you guys came from. This guy is going to move in there and is going to make two strikes against you, Pike. Natural 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: My armor class is 20, so they both hit me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a natural 18 plus six on top of that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Point taken!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of a sudden, your armor heats up and you see flames begin to lick up through the different sections of the plate, and the fire elemental is harrying right on top of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (singing) Oh, that girl is smoking on fire--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (singing) This girl is on fire! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, it's Percy and Pike's turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You first or me first?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, Percy, at the top of your turn-- actually, you both take--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I put myself out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take that soda can pop-topper off me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh no, wait! My Frost Brand sword. I'm resistant to fire damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take 14 points of fire damage. You also take what would be four is now two, so a total of 16 points of fire damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 16 points, okay. Wait, so what was it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Reality is malleable here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, what are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a nine. Actually, no. Shit. God damn it, that's a misfire. I'm going to spend an action to fix that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll the check on that, if you could.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, what is the check on that? That's a DC 12. Eight, nine, ten, 11, 12. I hit my check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just barely make it. The gun is not broken. As you spin, you go to fire, and something about the trajectory of the bullet is off, and as you release the trigger, all of a sudden the whole front of the barrel (cracking) encases in ice, and you're like, crap! And you have to chisel the ice off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fire again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it takes an action to try and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I looked. It takes an attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then yes, you're able to do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If it goes, then I'm--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then it takes an action to fix it, that's what it is. Yeah, it's an action to fix a broken gun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Better! 20 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 does hit, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I don't get the bonus on that because I suck. Seven points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Rolled a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sometimes it works out that way. All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm going to back off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cannot use your attack again until an action. It is an action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is an action? I thought it was an action to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an action to repair, and then if it breaks, you cannot use it until you're out of combat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did it break?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It did break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It didn't break. It jammed, and then it managed to alleviate that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would have switched guns, anyways, but okay, next time. For some reason I thought it was an attack action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No worries. That's the downside of the firearms. So no damage, you don't get your second attack off as you take your full action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To fix it, okay. That's fine; it was shitty damage anyways. Hey, I get to keep the bullet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool, so that ends Percy's turn. Pike, what are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Percy, where are you at, in terms of hit points?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm fine. I'm at half. I'm at 56.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's at 12.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know. He's at 12. Can I get over to Vax?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll not be able to get to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sprinter's Boots?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could with your Sprinter's Boots, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sprinter's Boots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The fire elemental does get an attack of opportunity on you. And that is a 17 to hit. Armor class is 20, so as it reaches towards you it just streaks off your armor (impact). The flames heat one of the plates below but you manage to pull out before it can actually find any real aggressive attack on you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was full road runner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as Pike rushes up to you and touches you on the side of your waist, as you feel all your wounds and burn marks tend to subside and heal up instantaneously.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh yeah! That's good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a little bit of something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah! I'll take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Pike's turn. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, I'm going to do a multiattack right on Cerkonos. So I'm going to do two (impacts) with my big wavy arms.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So plus seven to hit. So first one. 18, so that's 20. Okay. And second one. That's not as good. 19? Sorry, 18?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 also hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Cool. So that's 2d8 plus four bludgeoning damage, twice. So that's five, six. So that's ten. Nine, plus another 13. 23 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But because of your magical weapons, because you're a crazy druid, full 23 points of damage. As all of a sudden the elemental form starts slamming him with these giant tidal wave-like fists--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, plus an extra two because I'm a water elemental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. (wham, wham) You can see, steam is starting to billow off of Cerkonos's elemental form. They're both in this crazy tidal, epic elemental throw down. This is WWE style.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh no. It must be stopped!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going to stay where you are?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm on his ass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends Keyleth's turn. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I move around the backside of him without him getting an attack of opportunity if I stay just as close as I am now? No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you dart off to the side, he'll get a strike on you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Son of a bitch!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can he do a one-space move without an attack?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just because I'm cooking-- fuck it, I'll keep swinging. I'm in a frenzied rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Three strikes against Cerkonos.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no, a total of 20. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And a 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits. All three hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, you do take three points of fire damage, two points of fire damage, and ten. So a total of 15 points of fire damage from striking at it with your axe as the fire blows back onto you. Also, at the top of your turn because you were on fire, you took another eight points of fire damage from the flames burning and licking up your shoulders. You smell the scent of burning hair reach your nostrils.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's because we're family.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It could be your pubes! Don't jump to conclusions!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Grog's turn. Hold on, that your turn? At the top, Cerkonos is going to angrily now go into three more attacks. One against Keyleth, two against Grog, because Grog's starting to look a little rough, and the flames are affecting him more than it's affecting Keyleth. He turns to slam you twice. That is a 26?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That'll hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine plus eight. That is a 17?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 plus eight, that's a 27.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I don't know if that hits or not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry, that one's against Keyleth. So one hits you, one misses, and the last one was 27 versus you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take 11 points of fire damage from the strike. You take ten points, reduce that to five. So you take five points of fire damage. That is Cerkonos's turn. That brings us to Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so Cerkonos is still busy with Keyleth, so I'm going to take a split second to inhale, exhale, and then (dagger noises) right from where I am. So 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20 for the third. Do I get to pick which one is the--? Okay, so the first one hit, which is sneak attack, so that is four plus seven is 11, plus-- 14, 17, 23, 25-- 31 for the first hit. Second one, which was a hit, is-- which part gets doubled?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just the dice roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The dice roll. Four plus six is ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. (whoosh, whoosh, whoosh) You're launching the daggers out and it's difficult to focus on, because there is currently this swirl of water and flame that is going around. As your third dagger hits you can see the elemental form shrinks, and the water elemental that is Keyleth absorbs what you see now, Cerkonos in human druid form now, floating aloft in the center of Keyleth as an elemental. (static) Take that, microphone. Sorry, guys. (impact) And is that your turn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I come around the side of the wall. Hi! Oh hey. And I shoot at the other guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he within ten feet of anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I'm going to Lightning Arrow-- I'm going to Hunter's Mark him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Hunter's Mark is a bonus action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, so I'm going to Hail of Thorns him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? That does hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! 17, plus four, so that's 21, plus 3d10. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. As you come around the corner, releasing the arrow, it slams into the side of the elemental, bursts into it, you can see the splinters shooting throughout its form, sending out all these little fiery sparks as all the thorns burst into flames from the contact with the body, which then diminish and burn away into ash in the middle of the air.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Take two! That one doesn't hit, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't have huge AC.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Tiberius. At the top of your turn, you take ten points of fire damage, reduced to five, from the flames that are burning on your body.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I turn to the fire elemental because they're coherent, right? I'm like, do you really need me to do this? I ask it the question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, the elemental is just in the middle of-- it's just an amorphous flaming mass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Fine, so I go, Glacial Blast! With my finger. (hiss)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your DC on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So half damage. Go ahead and roll for the targeted blast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 14, 17, 18, plus six, so it's 24, plus another eight, so that's 32.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 32 points of ice damage reduced to half, because of that, so it takes 16 points of ice damage and would be grappled, if it wasn't immune to being grappled. As the ice encases around it, its fire form flicks out from underneath the ice and keeps itself fluid and moving.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, Tiberius, you gather the fire off of your body-- I'll say you are no longer on fire, as your Control Flame has pulled the fire from your torso and you're now just tossing it around in the middle of the Elemental Plane of Fire.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Would somebody end this, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a total of eight. And 19?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a 19? I'm going to spend a grit point and say that doesn't hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gunslinger's dodge?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep, I'm going to Gunslinger's dodge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What bit of scruff you had on your chin is now slowly withered away and burned into evaporated air. It's pretty rough. That ends its turn. Percy and Pike? You immediately have your action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to unload into its body. I know I'm at a disadvantage because I'm that close, but I'm just going to unload into its body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So three attacks at disadvantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three attacks with disadvantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was that a 20?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a 17, but it's okay, because I have disadvantage, so that's a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits. Second one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits. Third one?

lines.name: ORION, LIAM
lines.text: (gunshots)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So three shots against it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 18, plus 23, 26. 35 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lands on its knees, looks up at you, and gives you a quick little smile. At this point, you guys hear (roaring flames) this rolling, crumbling, angry, fiery sound as you glance over and you can see the cinderstorm is nearly upon you at this point in time. At this juncture, you guys can continue to fight if you want to, but you can see Cerkonos is looking over and looks at the rest of you. "We should go. Now."

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you complete the mission?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I slowly release him down from my water elemental form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he touches down, he immediately (poof) turns into a giant eagle, swoops and grabs you, Pike, (gripping sound) and heads towards the exit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess it's time to go.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I think we should go, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I drop my-- no. I'm going to keep in my water elemental form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What's the speed on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so same speed as you normally would be. All right, so. As you guys begin charging back in the direction you came from, dodging the lava pools as you come, the cinderstorm begins rolling in and you can see it's a full like-- you know that scene in the Mad Max movie? Looks like that, and it's pouring into the path you guys are running. You get about halfway there, about ten minutes into this run before the heat grows so intense that you can feel it now burning at the side of the face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I lied. I drop my elemental form. I go ahead and I'm going to cast Gust of Wind ahead of us to try and make a tunnel and try and air this heat down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That helps a little bit and gives you guys a little more leeway as you're pushing forward. The storm blows over you entirely, and darkness comes in. It feels like you're in the center of a cloud. There is light, somewhat, but your vision is obscured about five feet ahead of you and you think you're heading in the right direction towards the portal. You can see roughly, as Cerkonos is carrying you through the storm, I need everyone to go ahead and make a constitution check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Could I do a Mass Cure Wounds before I go? Because I was going to do that right last minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can ask him to drop you, if you want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm reaching out and clasping Vex's hand as we run forward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are rolling?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Constitution check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All of us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not too bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay! 21.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys keep pushing forward. For you guys, the sheer amount of heated ash that is starting to pour into your lungs, even though Keyleth is keeping a tunnel ahead of you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you suffer ten points of fire damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my stone's endurance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Shit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to ask him to drop me, and I'm going to do a Mass Cure Wounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh fuck, how high am I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: No, don't do it, Pike!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's dying!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'm okay. I got back 19 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You shrug off that damage. You don't heal past it, you just shrug off that damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take no damage from that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh. That's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. As you guys are racing forward, the storm is still blowing and you can hear Cerkonos shouting as a hawk, adding this beacon of noise as you guys are trying to follow suit. Since you're leading the way, Keyleth, I want you to go ahead and make a survival check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to say, can I use my wanderer ability where I think I get-- my survival ability? I think I get advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll give you advantage on this survival check. Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Please. That's much better! Okay. 14. No, don't-- sorry, I rolled a 14. 24!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slowly ahead of you, Keyleth, you see what looks like the slowly rotating portal that you guys stepped through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're almost there!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone once again make a constitution save.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hold on!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good. That was better!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: TRAVIS 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Everyone below a 15, you take 12 points of fire damage as the fumes come into your lungs. The wind tunnel is helping reduce the DC of the roll to a certain extent, but this is a very dangerous storm to be in. Essentially, every minute that passes that you're in it--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use a hit dice to heal myself at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You need a short rest to get there. You guys make your way to the outskirts of the portal and you leap through, as one by one, you all jump into this portal, the druids following behind. The sense of falling becomes this jettison motion as you are shoved and thrown into the air, out of the portal, and landing about 15 feet, 20 feet from the fall. I need all of you guys to make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you bastard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I use my saving throw reroll that I get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a skill check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a skill check? Damn it. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike, what'd you roll?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: One!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: ASHLEY Mass Cure Wounds? 33.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about my sister and Tibsy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everybody gets 33 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you guys managed to catch yourself, and don't take any damage as you land on your feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because they rolled a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you rolled a one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me and Tiberius rolled ones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take the three damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's it? Well. It's easy to get us confused though because we look so similar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is true.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 33, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks you in the eye. "You. You have the blessing "of the Pyrah behind you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Keyleth!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bravo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Go forth and continue your Aramente knowing we acknowledge your wisdom and ability."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, Cerkonos. Brother.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He reaches his hand out and clasps it. Lifts you to your feet. At this point he turns and nods to one of the nearby druids. The druid steps forward, presenting a black orb about that big of blackened rock that has red veins of pulsing energy arcing through it like a bolt of lightning locked in a single moment in time. "This is a spark stone, rare within the realm you just "escaped. We've harvested but a handful over generations, and few have returned with them. This "one is yours, Keyleth. To use yourself, or bequeath to an ally. When crushed by the hands of "one, their fists shall burn with the fury of an efreet."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For how long?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For as long as you wish."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Forever!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The choice is yours, who this blessing is given."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. This is a great honor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well. You're welcome to stay as long as you wish before you must continue on your journey."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think a rest might be in order. I'm exhausted.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. You think they have graham crackers and little bits of chocolate with marshmallow?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, to make s'mores? That's a great idea.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a good idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And also a lot of water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Water would be lovely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have water, Cerkonos?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I have water! (spraying)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, water begins spewing forth from this vial that Tiberius has. (spraying) All this steam is rising up as it hits the ground, the heat from the vicinity--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's mainly for drinking and such, but are we all done?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other druids step forward, looking a little thirsty themselves. It's a magical source of water, where they have to toil to bring it to their location. They all take out their cups and fill from it. You all drink. They take the small cups they have off to the side, they cheer to you, eventually leading you out of the Cindergrove. You guys break your way towards the druidic village on the outskirts of the forest. Cerkonos gives a nod, rubs his shoulder. "I am to tend to the wounds of "my helpers in your test. Do as you see fit. Leave when you feel comfortable. And good luck."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I bow to him, and I salute, and I say, Kaitiake, brother.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Kaitiake, princess." And he turns around and steps back towards the forest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, I rather enjoyed that environment myself.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What does kaitiake mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is sort of our salute. It means "guardian" and "brethren." It's a high salute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (mispronouncing) Kaitiake.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kaitiake.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kaitiake.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And not tomorrow please, but where do you need to go next for this quest of yours?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, my last stop would be to the Water Ashari. In Aquas. Back on another continent.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, that's good. I don't think we could take another one right now, anyway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I don't think we could. I'm doing pretty good, actually. I'm ahead of schedule.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (laughs) Wonderful. Let's just take some respite.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say for the sake of brevity, as it is getting rather late, and which for all of you guys watching, consider this lengthy episode a gift for the fact that we won't be doing this next week because some of us will be out of town. But you rest for a bit. You eventually find your way back down to the base of the mountain range. Your horses have not been touched, although they are a little hungry. An uneventful journey, make your way back to Vasselheim, where over the past six or seven days of travel, Pike, you come to find the curse has been lifted from the temple of Sarenrae, and your followers, as they are now calling themselves, though you had not expected to become this beacon of light to these worshipers who had no central focus or entity to guide them in their worship, you've become a very important figure to them, and they welcome your return to the temple.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if I want to stay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then talk to the producers of Blindspot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're an important figure to us as well, Pickles.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Pickles.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe you continue to do good in these lives?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well... debatable.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can leave them anytime, and we'll kick their ass so you can come back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Any moment at all.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This was so great, being a part of your journey that you had.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You are always part of our journey, no matter where we go, Pike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just keep the poo close.

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I don't know what it does exactly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have a good feeling about it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just put your faith in Sarenrae.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Well, I guess I'll go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (choked sob noise)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Explosions!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tatonka.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tatonka, yeah!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm sorry, but Tiberius runs up and squeezes Pike, one more time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hugs and loves.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You're my favorite gnome.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Dragonborn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike turns and returns towards the excavation of the long-lost temple of Sarenrae, you all give her--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It hurts every time, Pike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll see you soon.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Keyleth, you have the boon of the spark stone to gift to whoever or whatever you see fit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I know what it does? Can I do like a check on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best you can ascertain, looking at it, is once the stone is crushed, the hands of whatever creature crushes it become bequeathed with the flame of the elemental plane itself.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Interesting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That would be good for anybody.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can she use it? Well, she already has that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll keep it safe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can keep tabs on it. It doesn't affect a weapon if you're holding it. It's only physical attacks like punches, claws, anything like that are affected by the flame.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Could be cool for Grog. Boxing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would it enchant anything in animal form?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, claws? You said claws?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So an animal form of yours, Trinket, anyone like that would have flames on their forearms.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we'll wait until something is negated.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sleep on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and mark Spark Stone in your inventory. And with that, as it is 11:30, we're going to go ahead and bring this-- (laughs) Bring this session to a close, thank you guys for your patience. Thank you crew for your patience. Wanted to give Ashley a proper send-off and bring the conclusion to this chapter of the Aramente for Keyleth. Well done on your first brief journey to the harsh landscape that is the Elemental Plane of Fire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck that place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's awful. Thank god that dragon didn't freaking attack us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They don't sell any timeshares there, I gather.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just a reminder guys, me and Marisha will be out of town next week. There will be no Critical Role. We'll have members here that will be still here to stream and play games and answer questions and all kinds of stuff they'll have planned, I'm sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, and if you're in Denver I will be at-- is it Nan Desu Kan? I'm blanking. I'll be in Denver at Nan Desu Kan, so you can go see me in Denver.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's awesome. And some of you guys are going to be at--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The three of us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The two twins and the handsome one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to be at PAX tomorrow and Saturday, so I'm leaving tomorrow morning to head up to Seattle. Go say hi. We're doing a crowdplay of Tales from the Borderlands on Saturday night. You should come.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be fun.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So tune in next week for Chalk Talk with Tiberius.

lines.name: MATT, LIAM
lines.text: Yes! [end of transcription]
